variations.answer: 'Sold out' items are unavailable right now. You can sign up for notifications to know when they are back in stock.

variations.question: Can I return a product if it was damaged due to improper use?
variations.answer: Our return policy generally covers products that are defective or damaged upon arrival. Damage due to improper use may not be eligible for a return. Please contact our customer support team for assistance.

variations.question: What if my product is damaged because I used it incorrectly?
variations.answer: If the damage is due to improper use, it may not be eligible for a return. Please reach out to our customer support team for guidance.

variations.answer: Products damaged due to improper use are typically not eligible for returns. Contact our support team for more information.
